MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L34 postcode area of Prescot, affecting properties in Cyprus Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:40PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:50PM on 13th March 2021.
